main event: A civilian observed a bright, star-like object moving from west to east overhead in Reno, Nevada on September 7, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as looking like a star with a tail.
The object was so bright that it obscured the stars.
The object faded out at an elevation of 30 degrees.
The report states that the State Police could have been informed to observe the object as it was moving.
The report mentions that no other observers at local ranches were known to have been in a position to observe the object.
